com.emc.vipr.services.s3
Class NamespaceRequestHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.emc.vipr.services.s3.NamespaceRequestHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.amazonaws.handlers.RequestHandler
public class NamespaceRequestHandler
extends Object
implements com.amazonaws.handlers.RequestHandler

This handler can be added to an AmazonS3Client class to override the ViPR namespace. Generally, this will be automatically determined by the endpoint of the underlying S3 client in the form of {namespace}.company.com, but if this is not possible, it can be manually overriden by creating an instance of this class and registering it with the client. Note that the AmazonS3Client does not have a way to check if a handler is already registered, so care must be taken to ensure that handlers only get added once.
